mapper.sql: app_contact_.id AS app_contact_id, app_contact_.contact_id AS app_contact_contact_id, app_contact_.cellphone AS app_contact_cellphone, app_contact_.create_time AS app_contact_create_time, app_contact_.display_name AS app_contact_display_name, app_contact_.email AS app_contact_email, app_contact_.group_membership AS app_contact_group_membership, app_contact_.im AS app_contact_im, app_contact_.name AS app_contact_name, app_contact_.nickname AS app_contact_nickname, app_contact_.organization AS app_contact_organization, app_contact_.photo AS app_contact_photo, app_contact_.postal_address AS app_contact_postal_address, app_contact_.state AS app_contact_state, app_contact_.telephone AS app_contact_telephone, app_contact_.update_time AS app_contact_update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_app_contact ( cellphone, contact_id, user_id, display_name, email, group_membership, im, `name`, nickname, organization, photo, postal_address, state, create_time, telephone ) VALUES ( #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactId}, #{userId}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupMembership,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{im,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO t_app_contact ( cellphone, contact_id, user_id, display_name, email, group_membership, im, `name`, nickname, organization, photo, postal_address, state, create_time, telephone ) VALUES
( #{item.cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contactId}, #{item.userId}, #{item.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupMembership,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.im,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.postalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{item.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

( #{item.cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contactId}, #{userId}, #{item.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupMembership,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.im,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.postalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{item.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
